verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; about אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto them I am the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <S%H4639><s%> ke-ma-'a-Seh After the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where יְשַׁבְתֶּם־ <S%H3427><s%> ye-shav-tem- wherein ye dwelt בָּ֖הּ bah לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; shall ye not do וּכְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> u-che-ma-'a-Seh and after the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- of the land כְּנַ֡עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where אֲנִי֩ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֥ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su, you shall ye not do וּבְחֻקֹּתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2708><s%> u-ve-chuk-ko-tei-Hem in their ordinances לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> te-Le-chu. walk

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁפָּטַ֧י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tai my judgments תַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su Ye shall do וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֻקֹּתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai mine ordinances תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Ru and keep לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to live בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh therein I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem Ye shall therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tai, and my judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh do אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam if a man וָחַ֣י <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai he shall live בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. in them I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish to any אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish he אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any שְׁאֵ֣ר <S%H7607><s%> she-'Er that is near בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ro, of kin לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִקְרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> tik-re-Vu None of you shall approach לְגַלּ֣וֹת <S%H1540><s%> le-gal-Lot to him to uncover עֶרְוָ֑ה <S%H6172><s%> 'er-Vah; [their] nakedness אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. God ס sa-Mek

[even] their nakedness ס sa-Mek

וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-Shah a wife אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- addition אֲחֹתָ֖הּ <S%H269><s%> 'a-cho-Tah to her sister לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach; Neither shalt thou take לִצְרֹ֗ר <S%H6887><s%> litz-Ror, to vex לְגַלּ֧וֹת <S%H1540><s%> le-gal-Lot [her] to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֛הּ <S%H6172><s%> 'er-va-Tah her nakedness עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha in בְּחַיֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> be-chai-Yei-ha. beside the other in her life

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- about אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah unto a woman בְּנִדַּ֣ת <S%H5079><s%> be-nid-Dat as long as she is put apart טֻמְאָתָ֑הּ <S%H2932><s%> tum-'a-Tah; for her uncleanness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִקְרַ֔ב <S%H7126><s%> tik-Rav, Also thou shalt not approach לְגַלּ֖וֹת <S%H1540><s%> le-gal-Lot to uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> 'er-va-Tah. her nakedness

וּמִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> u-miz-zar-'a-Cha let any of thy seed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten And thou shalt not לְהַעֲבִ֣יר <S%H5674><s%> le-ha-'a-Vir pass לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> lam-Mo-lech; through [the fire] to Molech וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תְחַלֵּ֛ל <S%H2490><s%> te-chal-Lel neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha of thy God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et with זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char, with mankind לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> tish-Kav Thou shalt not lie מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <S%H4904><s%> mish-ke-Vei as with אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah; womankind תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vah it [is] abomination הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi he
